remarks: Distribution of group power over group operation for abelian groups. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxdi.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxdi.2 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxdi $p |- ( ( G e. AbelOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A G B ) P K ) = ( ( A P K ) G ( B P K ) ) ) $.
